title: Java Level 8 â€” Inheritance & Polymorphism
intro: This level covers inheritance and polymorphism to reuse and extend code.
points: Create subclasses that extend a base class using the extends keyword.
Understand method overriding and the use of @Override annotation.
Use super to access parent class members and constructors.
Understand the concept of dynamic method dispatch (runtime polymorphism).
Design simple class hierarchies to avoid code duplication.
